author: Matthew Robare
title: Density Isn’t Always Bad for Health
description: In the age of pandemic, don't write off cities as "existential threats." The post Density Isn’t Always Bad for Health appeared first on The American Conservative.
content: As the coronavirus pandemic continues to ravage the planet, a number of voices have begun to question the ideals of the well-established New Urbanism movement. Proximity, community, walkability, and the use of transit seem to be harbingers of disease and deat… [+7302 chars]
